p: The use of the ripe fruits and plant juice of Coriaria nepalensis ( Figure 3D) in case of indigestion is unexpected, because the leaves and fruits of many Coriaria species are considered poisonous in Asia, due to the presence of coriamyrtin with convulsive effects [ 64]. Nevertheless, in Chinese Traditional Medicine this species is used to treat various diseases [ 65], and the leaf juice was indicated as antiseptic among the Newar community of Kathmandu District [ 32].
